snippet.title: Dragonkin: The Banished | Early Access Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Dragonkin: The Banished is coming to Early Access on Steam on March 6th, 2025! 

Free a world ravaged by powerful Dragons! Dragon's blood seeps into the earth, corrupting everything it touches, as humanity lies on the brink, a group of heroes, some mutated by this draconic corruption stand up to fight back against the oncoming horde. 

Experience a new ARPG experience this spring, choose your hero, alter your skills using the unique Ancestral Grid mechanics, turn their own against them with your wyrmling companion, and join us as the game continues to expand through Early Access.

Wishlist now ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1863430/Dragonkin_The_Banished/
Join our Discord ► https://discord.gg/6G3U9f3QdT
Learn about why we're doing Early Access in our developer blog ► https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1863430/view/508442816334004686?l=english
-------------------------------
Learn more about Dragonkin: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/DragonkinGame
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/DragonkinGame
Twitter/X ► https://twitter.com/DragonkinGame
Discord ► https://discord.gg/6G3U9f3QdT
TikTok ► https://tiktok.com/@nacon

-------------------------------
